name: survive from the barrels
description:
THIS is game of SURVIVING from nuclear barrels its low poly and clean.

game made by IBRAHIM HAROON   a indie game developer. 

THIS IS MY FIRST "PUBLIC" game so ENJOY and leave your suggestions in the comments.

When you enter the game and see pistol mode dont click it it doesnt work, i am currently fixing it. Thanks.

DISCLAIMER : 

This is a test version of my game this will have a lot of bugs so report all the bugs in the comments. regards
